bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Charismatic Communion was a fellowship of Presbyterian clergy established in 1966. By the mid-1970s, the group accepted lay members as well.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Presbyterian Charismatic Communion. Materials include: membership directories; directories of Presbyterian-led praise and prayer groups; tape catalog, 1982; announcements, invitations, and flyers; pamphlets; and newsletters, 1974-1980.
